description:
Vice President, Business Development

Full-time staff position based in the US.

The Vice President, Business Development role requires an experienced, proactive, and energetic individual with strong leadership, management, proposal management, negotiation, and people skills.

The right individual would combine the drive to compete for and win large-scale projects with the emotional intelligence required to work across different teams, geographies, and cultures.

The role offers an experienced development sector professional the chance to support Integrity’s continued growth by implementing our US business strategy, developing key client and partner relationships, and overseeing successful bid pursuit.

You will work closely with Integrity’s leadership to oversee the development and implementation of our US business strategy and a growing opportunity pipeline that includes global IDIQs and multi-year projects across the world.

The role will report direct to Integrity’s Chief Commercial Officer, and will manage a team of business development professionals.

Closing date for applications : 15 December 2023. However, we will review candidates on a rolling basis and the vacancy may be filled before this deadline.

We encourage early applications. Applications without a tailored cover letter will not be considered.

For more information, see our Opportunities page : https : / / lnkd.in / d 7izJP
